revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Tanoby Ruins |image = [[File:Tanoby Ruins.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Tanoby Ruins. |tokens = 43,000 |location = Sevii Island 7, south of Sevault Canyon. }} '''Tanoby Ruins''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 720,600 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Tentacool.png|40px]] Tentacool|| rowspan=3| [[File:Ruin Maniac.png|40px]] Ruin Maniac Brandon || rowspan=3| [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix |- | [[File:Tentacruel.png|40px]] Tentacruel |- | [[File:Mantine.png|40px]] Mantine |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp || rowspan=3| [[File:Gentleman.png|40px]] Gentleman Clifford || rowspan=3| [[File:Marowak.png|40px]] Marowak, [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Golduck |- | [[File:Horsea.png|40px]] Horsea |- | [[File:Krabby.png|40px]] Krabby |- | [[File:Qwilfish.png|40px]] Qwilfish || rowspan=3| [[File:Painter.png|40px]] Painter Allison || rowspan=3| [[File:Smeargle.png|40px]] Smeargle |- | [[File:Remoraid.png|40px]] Remoraid |- | [[File:Gyarados.png|40px]] Gyarados |- | [[File:Seadra.png|40px]] Seadra || rowspan=3| [[File:Ruin Maniac.png|40px]] Ruin Maniac Brendon || rowspan=3| [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler, [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler |- | [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck |- | [[File:Kingler.png|40px]] Kingler |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[Tanoby Ruins#Unown Encounters in Tanoby Ruins|Unown (A) -> Unown (?)]] || <center>4,100,000 || colspan=3|<center>N/A |}
==== Unown Encounters in Tanoby Ruins ==== 24 Unown Forms (A-Z, excluding EFHP; Unown (!) and Unown (?) - seen below) can be found in Tanoby Ruins as Dungeon Bosses. One Unown form per day is randomly chosen to be the boss (switches at midnight).
[[File:Unown_(A).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(B).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(C).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(D).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(G).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(I).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(J).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(K).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(L).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(M).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(N).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(O).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(Q).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(R).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(S).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(T).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(U).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(V).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(W).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(X).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(Y).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(Z).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(!).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(QuestionMark).png|30px]]
==Items==
<tabs> <tab name="No Debuff"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 37.86% || 36.58% || 31.25% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || N/A || 37.86% || 36.58% || 31.25% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 20.21% || 21.33% || 25.99% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 4.05% || 5.28% || 10.42% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.22% || 1.10% |} </tab> <tab name="Debuff">
After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 37.54% || 37.54% || 37.54% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || N/A || 37.54% || 37.54% || 37.54% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 24.02% || 24.02% || 24.02% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 0.90% || 0.90% || 0.90% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |} </tab> </tabs>
{{Kanto Dungeons}} [[Category:Dungeons|^Region #1 - Kanto^c]]

It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 720,600 HP.
